Scripts.OnClick:
local activeState = self:GetActiveState()
if(button == "LeftButton") then if(activeState == 0 and 2 > MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods) then --TO 1 MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods = MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods + 1
MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].active = true MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].currentLayer = MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods
self.FontString:SetText(MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods)
elseif(activeState == 1) then --TO 2
elseif(activeState == 2) then --RESET TO 0 MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods = MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods - 1
MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].active = false MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].currentLayer = 0
self.FontString:SetText("")
for k, v in pairs(MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel]) do if(type(v) == "table" and v.currentLayer == 2) then v.currentLayer = 1 self:GetParent().sortByCategoryButtons[k].FontString:SetText(1) MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][k].currentLayer = 1 end end end
if(2 > MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods or MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods == 2 and MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].active == true) then self:AdvanceState()
MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].currentState = self:GetActiveState()
if(GameTooltip:GetOwner() == self) then GameTooltip:SetText("Current sort: "..self:GetStateName(self:GetActiveState())) end end
elseif(button == "RightButton") then if(activeState == 1 or activeState == 2) then
MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods = MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods - 1
MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].active = false MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].currentLayer = 0
self.FontString:SetText("")
for k, v in pairs(MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel]) do if(type(v) == "table" and v.currentLayer == 2) then v.currentLayer = 1 self:GetParent().sortByCategoryButtons[k].FontString:SetText(1) MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][k].currentLayer = 1 end end
self:SetState(false)
if(2 > MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods or MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel].numberOfActiveMethods == 2 and MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].active == true) then
--miog.F.SORT_METHODS[currentCategory].currentState = sortByCategoryButton:GetActiveState() --MIOG_SavedSettings.lastActiveSortingMethods.value[currentCategory] = miog.F.SORT_METHODS[currentCategory]
MIOG_SavedSettings.sortMethods.table[self.panel][self.category].currentState = self:GetActiveState()
if(GameTooltip:GetOwner() == self) then GameTooltip:SetText("Current sort: "..self:GetStateName(self:GetActiveState())) end end end end
